module.name: HTML
module.param:
Sideview LLC develops and sells commercial software for Splunk Enterprise and Splunk Cloud and was started in 2010. Sideview's primary product is the "Cisco CDR Reporting and Analytics" app for Splunk.

About Canary

The best place to learn more about Canary is on our website.

Feel free to contact us for any reason at all - if you have any questions large or small, technical questions, non-technical questions or even if you have cat photos that you think we should see.

If something in this app doesn't seem to be working right though just email us at support@sideviewapps.com and we'll respond promptly.
